rewards.description: To claim the inZOI: Creative Studio Key, those who own this Drops reward should link their Steam and KRAFTON ID on the playinzoi.com/events/drops page. Then, follow the event participation instructions and click "Claim Drops Rewards" to receive the key. This reward is granted to users who watched a Twitch stream in the inZOI category for at least 15 minutes. Additionally, inZOI: Creative Studio Key can be claimed from March 20, 00:00 (UTC) to March 22, 23:59 (UTC). Please make sure to redeem your reward within the given period.

rewards.description:
Celebrate the launch of War Robots: Frontiers on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox! We are looking to support all War Robots: Frontiers creators so we've made this campaign open to all streamers. Viewers can earn a reward by purchasing or gifting two (2) subscriptions on your channel.

If you want to participate in more exclusive War Robots: Frontiers Twitch Drops campaigns, join the MY.GAMES Content Creator Program at https://creators.my.games
rewards.name: Support a Streamer

rewards.description: Celebrate the launch of War Robots: Frontiers on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox! This campaign is only open to select creators so please ensure you have Twitch Drops enabled on your stream while streaming War Robots: Frontiers.
rewards.name: VIP Campaign

rewards.description: Kick off the Under The Wire Battle Pass by hooking your community up with exclusive rewards! By racking up enough watch time, they can unlock the powerful "Raven" War Robot and add it to their hangar for battle. From March 11-23, they'll need to tune in to your drop-enabled streamers on Twitch, rack up watch time, and claim their free loot from your Twitch Drops Inventory. All you need to do is enable Twitch Drops on your channel and stream War Robots: Frontiers!
rewards.name: Under The Wire Campaign

Season 15 Community Weekend is now live until March 24th (11am UTC)! Boost the Community Emissary Grade multiplier and earn these delightful drops by watching Sea of Thieves here on Twitch, get a free flag and Golden Sailor Hull simply by setting sail and more! 

Visit seaofthieves.com for more details!

Log in to link your Sea of Thieves and Twitch accounts! Then tune in during active Twitch Drops and watch any participating Sea of Thieves streamer live for a minimum of one hour to earn a reward. Be sure to claim each Drop within 24 hours!
rewards.name: Community Weekend!

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online March 2
